ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] Legends
ygData.msgSnippet: Wrong. Please read up before you spread your farts =P The regular servers will be updated as usual, the legend servers will receive legend specific content
ygData.messageBody:
Wrong. Please read up before you spread your farts =P

The regular servers will be updated as usual, the legend servers will
receive legend specific content that MAY be moved to normal servers after
awhile. They have hired extra staff (among 19 GMs, there hsould be gms
working 24/7 they say) that will ONLY be working with legend so that it
doesn't affect the normal servers.

I've not been online much due to overloaded at work but it seems fun, alot
of nice events and good guilds. It's kinda easy to join a high-end guild
since about 80% of the server is level 60.

It all looks very good so far.

-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Richard Skelton [mailto:richards@...]
Skickat: den 6 mars 2002 16:33
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: RE: [EverQuest] Legends


Legend is $40 a month. ALL new content in Everquest will go into Legend
first, and normal servers will suffer because of it, only getting new
updates as they filter out from Legend. The new content and improvements
will obviously come through to regular servers slower than in the past, in
order for Verant to justify the high subscription to Legend and keep those
few elite and rich players interested.

You might gather I dont subscribe to the Legend server :)

Rykk Bloodfang
52 Monk

-----Original Message-----
From: mlockridge01 [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Sent: 06 March 2002 15:28
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Legends


Anyone doing the new Legends thing? Looks cool, but the existing game
is still enough for me. How much more are they asking for Legends
access? I never saw a price.

Barto Proudfoot
Zeb server
